            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' , false ) !== false )
                        {
                              $Query = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' );
                              $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                              $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
                              $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
                              $First = get_field_ex( $Records , 'id' );
                              $Second = get_field_ex( $Records , 'value' );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $First = explode( '|' , $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'first' , false ) );
                              $Second = explode( '|' , $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'second' , false ) );
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $First , $Second ) );
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'collapsing_widget' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Width = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'width' , '400px' );
                              $BorderColor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'border_color' , 'black' );
                              $BackgroundColor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'border_color' , 'white' );
                              $ButtonText = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'button_text' , 'white' );
                              $Timeout = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'timeout' , 200 );
                              $DivSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'div_selector' , 200 );
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{collapsing_widget:$Parameters}" , 
                                    "<script>$( '$DivSelector' ).collapsing_widget( ".
                                          "{ 'width' : '$Width' , 'button_text' : '$ButtonText' , 'timeout' : $Timeout , ".
                                          "'border_color' : '$BorderColor' , 'background_color' : '$BackgroundColor' , '' ".
                                          "} );</script>" , 
                                    $Str
                              );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

Definition at line 835 of file gui.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'condition' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $this->PageParser->find_next_macro( $Str , 'composer' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $BlockSettings = &$this->PageParser->get_macro_parameters();
                              $Condition = intval( $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'condition' ) );

                              if( $Condition )
                              {
                                    $Str = $this->PageParser->show_macro( $Str , 'composer' );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Str = $this->PageParser->hide_macro( $Str , 'composer' );
                              }
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

process_date ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'date'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 777 of file gui.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'timestamp' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'date' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Format = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'format' , 'Y-m-d' );
                              
                              if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , false ) !== false )
                              {
                                    $Value = date( $Format , strtotime( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , 'now' ) ) );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Value = date( $Format , intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'timestamp' , time() ) ) );
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{date:$Parameters}" , $Value , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'date_picker' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'date_picker.tpl' );
                              
                              $Template = str_replace( '{name}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' ) , $Template );
                              $Value = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , '' );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{value}' , $Value , $Template );

                              $Str = str_replace( "{date_picker:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }

Definition at line 599 of file gui.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'get_var' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $Value = isset( $this->Vars[ $Name ] ) ? 
                                    $this->Vars[ $Name ] : 
                                    $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , '' );

                              $Str = str_replace( "{get_var:$Parameters}" , $Value , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

$  Changed

array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.

Definition at line 311 of file gui.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'tpl' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'page' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'action' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'href' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'waiting' , 'false' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'text' , 'no_text' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'raw_text' , '' );

                              $FileName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'tpl' , 'std' );
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $FileName.'.tpl' );

                              $ConfirmString = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'confirm_string' , 'are_you_shure' );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{confirm_string}' , $ConfirmString , $Template );

                              $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
                              $Str = str_replace( "{href:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_select ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'select'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 418 of file gui.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'default' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $Class = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'width_320 flat' );

                              $SelectedId = $this->Security->get_gp( 
                                    $Name , 'string' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , false )
                              );

                              list( $First , $Second ) = $this->get_select_data( $this->BlockSettings );
                              
                              $Template = "<select id=\"$Name\" name=\"$Name\" class=\"$Class\">";

                              foreach( $First as $k => $v )
                              {
                                    $Selected = '';
                                    
                                    if( $SelectedId !== false && $SelectedId == $v )
                                    {
                                          $Selected = 'selected ';
                                    }
                                    
                                    $Template .= '<option '.$Selected.'value="'.$v.'">'.$Second[ $k ];
                              }
                              
                              $Template .= '</select>';
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{select:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'textarea' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'toolbar' , 'ultimix_full' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'name' , 'editor');
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'class' , 'width_640 height_480' );
                              $Text = $this->String->get_block_data( $Str , "textarea:$Parameters" , '~textarea' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'text' , $Text );
                              
                              $EditorTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'editor.tpl' );
                              $RawSettings = $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings();
                              $EditorTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $EditorTemplate , $RawSettings );
                              $Str = str_replace( "{textarea:$Parameters}" , $EditorTemplate."{textarea:$Parameters}" , $Str );
                              
                              $Str = $this->String->hide_block( $Str , "textarea:$Parameters" , '~textarea' , $Changed );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'year_list' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $Class = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'flat width_80' );
                              $Template = '<select id="'.$Name.'" name="'.$Name.'" class="'.$Class.'">';
                              
                              $Default = date( 'Y' , strtotime( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , 'now' ) ) );
                              $Default = $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' , $Default );
                              
                              $From = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'from' , intval( date( 'Y' ) ) - 10 );
                              $To = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'to' , intval( date( 'Y' ) ) + 10 );
                              
                              for( $i = $From ; $i <= $To ; $i++ )
                              {
                                    if( $Default == $i )
                                    {
                                          $Template .= '<option value="'.$i.'" selected>'.$i.'</option>';
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Template .= '<option value="'.$i.'">'.$i.'</option>';
                                    }
                              }

                              $Template .= '</select>';
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{year_list:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
